import { useState,useEffect } from 'react'; import { connect} from 'react-redux'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import Navbar from '../Component/Navbar'; import Loader from "react-loader-spinner" function CartItem(props) { var [cakelist, setCakelist] =useState([]) var[loader,setloader]=useState(true) const history = useHistory(); const btn_additem = (id,cakeid) => { setCakelist(props.cartcakeslist) const newitmlist = cakelist.filter((cake)=>{ return Object.values(cake).join(" ").includes(cakeid) }) var datacake={name:newitmlist[0].name, cakeid:newitmlist[0].cakeid, price:newitmlist[0].price, weight:newitmlist[0].weight, image:newitmlist[0].image} console.log("????",datacake) props.dispatch({ type:"Add_Cart_Item_Quantity", payload:datacake }) } const btn_removeitem = (id,cakeid) => { setCakelist(props.cartcakeslist) props.dispatch({ type:"REMOVE_Cart_Item_Quantity", payload:cakeid }) var itemquntity=document.getElementById("cartitemcount").innerHTML itemquntity-=1 } const btn_deleteitem = (id,cakeid) => { setCakelist(props.cartcakeslist) props.dispatch({ type:"DELETE_Cart_Item_Quantity", payload:cakeid }) console.log(id,cakeid) } useEffect(()=>{ props.dispatch({ type:"Cart_Items" }) setCakelist(props.cartcakeslist) setloader(false) },[]) const cakeitemlist =props.cartcakeslist.map((each,index) => (
{each.name}
{each.quantity*each.price}Rs
{each.quantity}
{each.price}Rs
) ) return ( <> {loader &&
} {!localStorage.token && history.push("/Login") } {localStorage.token && !loader &&

Shopping Cart

3 items
{cakeitemlist.length===0 &&

Your cart is empty

} {cakeitemlist}
Summary
Item3
315Rupees
TOTAL PRICE
315Rupees
} ); } export default connect(function(state,props){ return{ cartcakeslist:state["cartitemslist"]["cartitems"]||[] } }) (CartItem)
